title: 48 Hours Until All Sides of Crypto Meet IRL at Consensus 2022
content: In just 48 hours the crypto community is taking over Downtown Austin for the crypto event of the year - Consensus 2022 by CoinDesk.

Did you know this is the eighth year of Consensus? That makes it the longest-running crypto festival out there. To celebrate, here are eight reasons why you won’t want to miss Consensus 2022, the best year yet!
